abstract: Police arrest two suspects in connection with rape of elderly nun during robbery of convent school in India.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested two suspects on Thursday in the rape of an elderly nun in a Catholic missionary school this month, a crime that further fueled the intense national debate about the problem of sexual violence.

headline.main: India: 2 Suspects Held in Rape of Nun
headline.print_headline: Asia; India: 2 Suspects Held in Rape of Nun

snippet: The police arrested two suspects on Thursday in the rape of an elderly nun in a Catholic missionary school this month, a crime that further fueled the intense national debate about the problem of sexual violence.
